Headline: Correction: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute at State/115th
ShortDescription: SB 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Correction: Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/115th
ShortDescription: Southbound 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Southbound #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/115th.

Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Harlem
ShortDescription: Update: 63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Harlem, 65th, Old Harlem and into terminal due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Harlem, 65th, Old Harlem and into terminal due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harlem.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 69th
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby #29 State bus route, or using buses to other rail lines. Shuttle buses requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
